# monad_transform (Resource)

Monad Secret

## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the transform

### Optional

- `config` (Block, Optional) Transform configuration (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--config))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Transform identifier
